title: Bircher Muesli

ingredients.content: 40 g whole mixed nuts (e.g almonds, hazelnuts, macadamias)
40 g dried fruit (e.g figs, cranberries, dates)
1 Granny Smith apple, unpeeled, cored, quartered (approx. 95 g)
mixed fresh fruit (e.g. pomegranate seeds, strawberries, blueberries), for serving

preparations.content: Place oats, apple juice, cinnamon and nutmeg in a large bowl then cover with cling film and leave to soak overnight in fridge.
The next day, place nuts, desiccated coconut and dried fruit in mixing bowl then chop <b>3 sec/speed 5.5<b>. Add to bowl with muesli mixture.

Place apple in mixing bowl and chop <b>2 sec/speed 6<b>. Add to bowl with muesli mixture and gently stir together with spatula. Serve with a spoonful of Greek yoghurt per portion and mixed fresh fruit.

hintsAndTricks: This continental recipe soaks oats overnight, making them easier to digest. Combined with raw fruit and topped with yoghurt, it makes a great alternative to processed, shop-bought cereals.
